Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: Perform file operations uploaded through Popup/UserInput activities and workflow inputs
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><INP_DIRECTORY class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">C:\WORKFLOW_AUTO</INP_DIRECTORY><INP_FILE class="workflow.types.File" _list_="false" /><INP_PB_DELAY class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">0</INP_PB_DELAY><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><INP_PAUSE_WF class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF><INP_PAUSE_FILE_OPR class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_FILE_OPR><INP_PAUSE_FILE_OPR_MULTIPLE class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_FILE_OPR_MULTIPLE><IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII></inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: WF_FILE_UPLOAD_OPERATIONS
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><var_user_input_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_FILE_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_DIR_JOBID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_PAUSE_STRING class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">.</VAR_PAUSE_STRING><VAR_WF_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">COMPLETED</VAR_WF_STATUS><VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VAR_FILE_NUMBER class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">0</VAR_FILE_NUMBER></variables>

Activity.description: Execute a script on a remote machine
Activity.name: ExecuteScript

inputs.val: <inputs><client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_client}</client><impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String" /><impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" /><startUpPath class="java.lang.String" /><scriptType class="commvault.msgs.App.ScriptType">WindowsBatch</scriptType><script class="java.lang.String">if not exist "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_destination_directory}" ( mkdir "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_destination_directory}" exit 0 ) else ( exit 0 )</script><arguments class="java.lang.String" /><waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean">true</waitForProcessCompletion></inputs>

inputs.val: <inputs><client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_client}</client><impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false" /><startUpPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><command class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">powershell "copy 'xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_source_file_path}' 'xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_destination_directory}'"</command><arguments class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</waitForProcessCompletion></inputs>

inputs.val: <inputs><actions><name>Submit</name><validateForm>true</validateForm></actions><inputs><POPUP1_FILES class="workflow.types.File" _list_="true" /><POPUP2_FILE class="workflow.types.File" _list_="false"></POPUP2_FILE></inputs><subject>Upload Files - Pop Up Activity</subject><formProperties><?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><Workflow_FormProperties css="" javaScript="" pageMode="0" formVersion="0"><rules /></Workflow_FormProperties></formProperties></inputs>

condition.script: !xpath:{/workflow/PopupInput_1/actionSelected}.equals("Submit") || xpath:{/workflow/PopupInput_1/system/status}.equalsIgnoreCase("INTERRUPT PENDING") ;

Activity.description: File operation will be done on the files uploaded
Activity.name: UserInput

inputs.val:
<inputs><interactionUsers class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.UserEntity"><userName>Admin</userName><userId>1</userId></interactionUsers><actions><name>Submit</name><validateForm>true</validateForm></actions><inputs><UI_FILES class="workflow.types.File" _list_="true" /><UI2_FILE class="workflow.types.File" _list_="false"></UI2_FILE></inputs><subject>Upload Files - UserInput Activity</subject><sendEmail>true</sendEmail><approvalEnabled>false</approvalEnabled><email><from></from><to></to><cc></cc><bcc></bcc><subject>Workflow waiting on Approval: xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName} :[xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId} ]:  xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</subject><attachments></attachments><repeatInterval></repeatInterval><body><p>
      Please take appropriate action to continue the Workflow.
    </p></body><html>true</html></email><formProperties><?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><Workflow_FormProperties css="" javaScript="" pageMode="0" formVersion="0"><rules /></Workflow_FormProperties></formProperties></inputs>

condition.script: !xpath:{/workflow/UserInput_1/actionSelected}.equals("Submit") || xpath:{/workflow/UserInput_1/system/status}.equalsIgnoreCase("INTERRUPT PENDING") ;

onEnter.script: workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE","PHASE START : [" + xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId} + "][" + xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName} + "][" + xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime} +"] : Loop File operations on Multiple Files"); logger.info("INFO: VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE : [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE") + "]");

Activity.description: iterates a group of activities over a list of values
Activity.name: ForEach

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="/* Set uploaded File path */
File fileObject = xpath:{/workflow/ForEach_2/pb2_files_list};
workflow.setVariable("VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH",fileObject.getAbsolutePath());
logger.info("INFO: File uploaded on server ["+ xpath:{/workflow/system/workflowEngine/clientName} +"] at the location:-> ["+ workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH") +"]");

logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH") + "]");
/* Set uploaded File name */
workflow.setVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME",fileObject.getName());
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_FILE_NAME = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME") + "]");
/* Set Destination directory */
String tmp = xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_DIRECTORY} + "\\" + xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId};
workflow.setVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_DIR_JOBID = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID") + "]");
/* Set new file name */
String tmp = "moved_" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME");
workflow.setVariable("VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME") + "]");
/* Set Destination path for new file */
String tmp = workflow.getVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID") + "\\" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME");
workflow.setVariable("VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH") + "]");
/* Set destination path for current file */
String tmp = workflow.getVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID") + "\\" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME");
workflow.setVariable("VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH") + "]");" /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes a defined process block within the workflow
Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

inputs.val: <inputs><inputs><pb1_client class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/workflowEngine/clientName}</pb1_client><pb1_delay class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_PB_DELAY}</pb1_delay><pb1_source_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH}</pb1_source_file_path><pb1_destination_directory class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DIR_JOBID}</pb1_destination_directory><pb1_destination_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH}</pb1_destination_file_path><pb1_moved_file_path class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH}</pb1_moved_file_path></inputs><processBlock>ProcessBlock_1</processBlock><outputs /></inputs>

inputs.val: <inputs><inputs><pb_status class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><pb_file_number class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><pb_failiure_message class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Number of Files uploaded is different than files present at Destination</pb_failiure_message></inputs></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status} + "]");
logger.info("INFO: Total file fetched from directory: [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_file_number} + "]");
logger.info("INFO: VAR_FILE_NUMBER : [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_FILE_NUMBER} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED") || xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_file_number} != xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_FILE_NUMBER})
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_failiure_message});
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes a defined process block within the workflow
Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

Activity.description: displays an informational message to the user
Activity.name: InformationalMessage

inputs.val:
<inputs><message><p>
      Workflow to do File Operations uploaded through Popup / UserInput and 
      Workflow input activities
    </p>
    <p>
      
    </p>
    <p>
      a. Workflow Takes in File inputs from Popup activity and does file 
      operations on the uploaded files.
    </p>
    <p>
      b. Then takes in File input from User input activity and does file 
      operations on the uploaded files.
    </p>
    <p>
      c. File Operations are then performed on the files uploaded from 
      Workflow input.
    </p></message><dialogType>Popup</dialogType><iconType>Information</iconType><title>Workflow Description</title><html>true</html><formProperties /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes a defined process block within the workflow
Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

onExit.script: workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE","PHASE START : Upload Files through UserInput"); logger.info("INFO: VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE : [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE") + "]");

onEnter.script: workflow.setVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE","PHASE START : Call FileOperations for Pop-UP Input Files"); logger.info("INFO: VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE : [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE") + "]");

Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock
